pageContext.claim: “Germany has consistently been used by my obnoxious critics as the country that we should follow on the way to handle the China Virus. So much for that argument. I love Germany - Vaccines on the way!!!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump once again suggests vaccines will end the pandemic quickly. By all accounts, German officials handled the pandemic with skill. The article that Trump tweeted showed that the per-capita death rate in Germany was still far below the United States.
